io.spine.server.procman

Class PmEventEndpoint<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.EntityMessageEndpoint<I,P,M,R>
      • io.spine.server.procman.PmEventEndpoint<I,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of process manager IDs
    P - the type of process managers

    @Internal
public class PmEventEndpoint<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,?,?>>
extends EntityMessageEndpoint<I,P,M,R>
    Dispatches event to reacting process managers.

      • deliverNowTo

        protected void deliverNowTo(I id)
        Description copied from class: EntityMessageEndpoint
        Dispatches the message to the entity with the passed ID, providing transactional work and storage of the entity.

        Performs the delivery directly to the entity not taking the delivery strategy into account.

        Specified by:
        deliverNowTo in class EntityMessageEndpoint<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,?,?>,M extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>,R>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity for which to dispatch the message
